game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AI, Human

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for all players.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Group 1 - DAT055 2014

        Check if this player has any ships left.
        Returns:

        Bomb a zone on this player's battlefield.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the zone
        y - The y-coordinate of the zone
        Returns:
        MISS, HIT or SUNK
